amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to direct the Secretary of Defense to provide DOD medical providers with mandatory training with respect to the potential health effects of PFAS and add additional language to address PFAS contamination.
amendment.purpose: Amendment to direct the Secretary of Defense to provide DOD medical providers with mandatory training with respect to the potential health effects of PFAS and add additional language to address PFAS contamination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 186 (Roll no. 272).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
